ingredients.ingredient: ⅓ cup cocoa powder (such as Hershey's®)

cookingTips: Pulse ingredients until mixture holds together when pressed
Roll balls between your palms—chill hands first for easier handling
Store in the refrigerator in an airtight container for up to 2 weeks
enrichment.coachingPrompt: These nutrient-dense bites provide complete protein from hemp seeds and natural sweetness from dates. How will you use them for quick energy?
